Title: Authentic FREY WILLE Gustav Klimt Hoffnung Hope Enamel Diva Bangle MEDIUM + Box
ConditionDescription: Worn once and in great condition!
Description: I am downsizing and selling all my personally collections! I have personally acquired this from Europe.Guaranteed 100% authentic FREY WILLE in the most beautiful enamel with 24K accents bangle from their famous "Hommage à Gustav Klimt" collection: Hoffnung (Hope) design.The design has bright colorful colors in geometry design with handcrafted 24K yellow gold application set in yellow gold-plated mounting. This is a wide DIVA bangle avant garde style with 2 yellow gold-plated mounting rims.You have to see it in person to see the magical beauty of it. I just cannot capture the lovely design and beautiful workmanship on a camera! The bangle width measures 1-3/8 inches (3.5 cm) wide. This is a Medium (M): 2.5 inches (6.3 cm) wide interior diameter.The outside circumference is 8.25 inches (21 cm). The inside is 7.75 inches (19.5 cm).Please see the last gallery picture on how to measure your hand to determine if this bangle size is for you.Markings on the inside "FREY WILLE and its logo ®" and "Made in Austria" .It will include the FREY WILLE original presentation box as shown.Condition is previously loved with very minimal scuffing as shown. There may be lighting reflection only and no chip to the enamel. This is one of my favorite designs! I have been a collector of Frey Wille (Michaela Frey) brand jewelry since the year of 2000. I have known a lot about its history and collections/designs. I consider myself an expert in this particular brand in the U.S.A. I have also been a collector of antique (both fine and costume) jewelry for the last 30 years and fond of enamel jewelry. You can purchase with confidence! I do not accept return on this item due to delicate jewelry item. If you are buying this as gift and may need to return it, please notify me first before purchasing this item. Even if you buy from a Frey Wille store, they will not accept return nor exchange. I describe my item exactly what it is. I personally took the pictures and measurements myself. You are getting a substantial discount here and please be fair to me also. * * * * *SPECIAL NOTE TO FRENCH CUSTOMERS OR TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN:Unless mentioned in description, do not assume there is paperwork or receipt with this item.
